about_the_game:
CRASHTEST is a fast faced neon FPS game, and the game soundtrack compliments this crushing FPS game perfectly. The soundtrack is unique, composed by Sean Tierney and InfaReQt, with epic songs from beautiful synth like "Suspension" to pure insanity and chaos like "Gatekeeper".

CRASHTEST's Soundtrack composed by Sean Tierney and InfaReQt is something you will never forget!
detailed_description:
CRASHTEST is a fast faced neon FPS game, and the game soundtrack compliments this crushing FPS game perfectly. The soundtrack is unique, composed by Sean Tierney and InfaReQt, with epic songs from beautiful synth like "Suspension" to pure insanity and chaos like "Gatekeeper".

CRASHTEST's Soundtrack composed by Sean Tierney and InfaReQt is something you will never forget!
legal_notice:
Soundtrack is composed specifically for CRASHTEST.
Music is composed by Sean Tierney and Polly Povetsky.
name: CRASHTEST: Original Game Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 167 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 167 MB available space

short_description: The official and original soundtrack for CRASHTEST!
